verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In a speech] [ARGM-TMP: last year] , [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: he thinks the police should be rougher with people during arrests] . But we know that they are plenty rough already — and very often without cause . It seems like every day a new video emerges of police misconduct ...
